articles.author: MSNBC.com
articles.title: Jerome Corsi negotiating plea agreement with Mueller
articles.description: Roger Stone associate and conspiracy theorist Jerome Corsi confirmed to NBC News that he is negotiating a plea agreement with special counsel Robert Mueller. Corsi has been questioned over his connection with WikiLeaks.

articles.title: Federal report warns climate change will greatly affect health, economy
articles.description: A federal report has found that climate change will have a devastating impact on the health of Americans and warns that the country's economy will be negatively affected by the end of the century.

articles.title: The lowdown on the James Comey subpoena from NBC News' Pete Williams

articles.title: Political newcomer Katie Hill flips Republican stronghold in California House race
